(cpi, power_memory).explanation: Higher CPI increases execution time and memory access patterns, directly affecting memory subsystem power consumption through increased activity;

(cpi, power).explanation: CPI directly influences overall execution time and processor activity levels, which determines total power consumption across all processor components;

(cpi, power_pad).explanation: CPI affects computational workload while pad power is primarily determined by I/O interface design and activity, with no direct causal relationship;
